accordianModelLeft.title: Can I buy a lot of followers?
accordianModelLeft.text: You can get as many friends as you want. We have packages with between 50 and 50,000 followers. Our customer service team is here to help if you need a unique package.

accordianModelLeft.title: How long does it take to deliver?
accordianModelLeft.text: As soon as your order is confirmed, delivery begins right away. You’ll get an email telling you, and soon after, followers will show up on your page.

accordianModelLeft.title: Will having it grow my business?
accordianModelLeft.text: Of course! More followers make you seem more trustworthy and bring you more natural followers. This is a great way to make your business more well-known and reliable.

accordianModelLeft.title: How do I pay for my order?
accordianModelLeft.text: You can pay us with PayPal or a major credit card. We don’t ask for private information, and your transaction is safe.

accordianModelLeft.title: How Long Do People Follow You?
accordianModelLeft.text: The followers you buy are natural and are already following you. They will stay on your page until you delete them.

accordianModelRight.title: Will people find out that I bought followers?
accordianModelRight.text: No, we care about your safety. We give you real followers with real accounts, so no one will ever know you bought them.

accordianModelRight.title: What if I change my mind?
accordianModelRight.text: You can get rid of followers you bought whenever you want, and there’s no risk. If you take them down, you will get your money back.

accordianModelRight.title: Does the process seem safe?
accordianModelRight.text: We follow Instagram’s Terms of Service, and our process is safe. We offer real followers and use a secure, natural process.

accordianModelRight.title: How does the refill work?
accordianModelRight.text: If your number of followers drops, you can get more by calling our customer service team at any time. We are here to ensure you are happy with our service.

accordianModelRight.title: Is it okay to buy followers on Instagram?
accordianModelRight.text: It is possible to buy Instagram followers. We ensure you follow Instagram’s rules by giving you honest, live followers.

accordianModelRight.title: Why Do Followers Stop?
accordianModelRight.text: Drops don’t happen often, but they can if people mark accounts as spam. Because of these problems, we give free refills to compensate for lost items.
